headline: Norman’s Johnson Controls plant acquired by Bosch in $8.6 billion merger
summary: The Johnson Controls heating, ventilation, and air conditioning plant in Norman will now operate under the new ownership of Bosch, a German multinational engineering and technology company. Bosch officials announced the completion of the acquisition Friday, unveiling a new sign on the building featuring the company’s name and logo, which is a schematic of a magneto first manufactured in 1898 ...
